title: Fliud Mechanics and Vector Field for Engineering (Note 1)
content:
The defination of fluid
 
The categories of the study of fluid

fluid statics is the study of fluids at rest.  
fluid kinematics is the study of fluids in motion just foucs on velocity vector()and acceleration vector().  
fluid dynamics is the study of fluids in motion by force.
